title: Law establishing Rwanda Education Board Law and Determining its Mission, Organisation and Functioning
title_en: Law establishing Rwanda Education Board Law and Determining its Mission, Organisation and Functioning

provisions.title: Article 35 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 28/04/2017 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
